children.text: High Timber Lounge is located in the Carinthia Base Lodge. Enjoy a cold beverage and a bite from the Café with a view of some of the best terrain parks around.
High Timber Cafe is Carinthia’s open-concept food court with offerings that include traditional favorites, ramen noodles, grilled cheese, and salad or grain bowls.
Canned is a one-stop-shop for all your canned beverage needs with a variety of craft beers, ciders, and seltzers. Offering both indoor and walk-up window service.
Sundance Cafe is located inside the Sundance Base Lodge and boasts both traditional fare and delicious BBQ options not offered at our other lodges. Be sure to visit Coop's Bar upstairs!
Grand Country Deli is a great spot to grab a quick breakfast or lunch. Found the ground floor of the Grand Summit Resort Hotel, featured items include the Breakfast Scramble Platter.
1900' Burger is a favorite off the Main Base Lodge with a view of the slopes and offers a variety of gourmet burgers and fries, craft beer, and milkshakes.
The Summit Lodge Cafe is where you can grab a bite to eat while warming up at 3,600’! Offering breakfast options, grab & go items, soups & stews and delicious, satisfying baked potatoes.
The Station Tap Room offers a wide selection of craft brews from near and far with outdoor seating and live music on Sundays.
The Snow Barn is located on the shore of Snow Lake and offers simple bites and the best bar and live music scene in the Valley.
Iron Loft is on the top floor of the Carinthia Base Lodge with a great view of the terrain parks. Offering an elevated lunch and apres experience with an expansive wine list and craft cocktails.

Upstairs in the Summit Lodge, you’ll find The Bullwheel, offering a variety of hearty hot and cold sandwiches, sharable dishes, grab & go snacks, and an all-VT draft list. With the observation deck overlooking Somerset Reservoir, The Bullwheel offers great food with a view.
Harriman's Pub & Kitchen offers a fun, casual southern Vermont dining experience in the Grand Summit Hotel. Reservations recommended.
Marketfresh is a food court offering a variety of breakfast & lunch favorites, elevated specialty items, and grab & go options.
Cuzzins is a full service restaurant that features a variety of pub and comfort entrees, appetizers and beverages. A premier apres venue with live music with Bruce Jacques on Saturdays.

data.title: Carinthia Base Lodge Ski Patrol Station
